member.name: M:Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.CellContentSizeHelper.GetCellContentSize(System.String,Telerik.Documents.SpreadsheetStreaming.SpreadCellFormat,System.Double)

member.param: The cell value. If formula is passed the method will throw an ArgumentException.

The size of the font in points.
A value indicating whether the text is bold.
A value indicating whether the text is italic.
